time_value.description: The timestamp value from the 'time' dimension, used for replication.

time.description: The value of the 'time' dimension if requested.

delivered_smtp_count.description: Count of messages delivered via SMTP.

delivered_http_count.description: Count of messages delivered via HTTP.

delivered_optimized_count.description: Count of messages delivered after optimization.

clicked_rate.description: Click rate for messages (represented as a string).

description: Schema for Mailgun Analytics Metrics records after transformation.
